explanation.title: Key Idea
explanation.text: Polite English uses questions, modal verbs (could, would), and words like "please" and "sorry" to show respect and make conversations smoother.

vocab.target: Could I have some water, please?
Sorry, could you say that again?
Excuse me, could you move please?
I'm sorry, I don't quite understand.
Try to be on time, please.
